sql-script.name: contacts
sql-script.tran-sql: create table sf_contacts ( id char (32) not null, orgid char (32), text varchar2 (32 char) not null, py varchar2 (32 char), sex varchar2 (2 char) not null, birthday date, dept varchar2 (64 char), job varchar2 (64 char), nick varchar2 (32 char), email varchar2 (32 char), mobile varchar2 (16 char), workphone varchar2 (16 char), workphone2 varchar2 (16 char), fax varchar2 (16 char), homephone varchar2 (16 char), workaddress varchar2 (256 char), homeaddress varchar2 (256 char), postcode varchar2 (8 char), qq varchar2 (16 char), weixin varchar2 (16 char), description varchar2 (256 char), userid char (32), deptid char (32), deptdict varchar2 (64), oorder number(11) not null, primary key (id), unique (oorder) );

create table sf_contacts_tag ( id char (32) not null, orgid char (32), text varchar2 (32 char) not null, description varchar2 (256 char), oorder number(11) not null, contacts number(11) not null, primary key (id), unique (orgid, text), unique (oorder) );
create table sf_contacts_tagr ( id char(32) not null, tagid char(32) not null, contactsid char(32) not null, primary key(id), unique(tagid, contactsid) );

create table sf_mycontacts ( id char (32) not null, ownerid char (32) not null, orgid char (32), text varchar2 (32 char) not null, py varchar2 (32 char), sex varchar2 (2 char) not null, birthday date, dept varchar2 (64 char), job varchar2 (64 char), nick varchar2 (32 char), email varchar2 (32 char), mobile varchar2 (16 char), workphone varchar2 (16 char), workphone2 varchar2 (16 char), fax varchar2 (16 char), homephone varchar2 (16 char), workaddress varchar2 (256 char), homeaddress varchar2 (256 char), postcode varchar2 (8 char), qq varchar2 (16 char), weixin varchar2 (16 char), description varchar2 (256 char), userid char (32), deptid char (32), deptdict varchar2 (64), oorder number(11) not null, primary key (id), unique (ownerid, text), unique (oorder) );

create table sf_mycontacts_tag ( id char (32) not null, ownerid char (32) not null, orgid char (32), text varchar2 (32 char) not null, description varchar2 (256 char), oorder number(11) not null, contacts number(11) not null, primary key (id), unique (ownerid, text), unique (oorder) );
